name: Psuedo-Real Time
description:
Psuedo-Real Time was a first in many things for me. Created in about 14 weeks during my second semester of college you and your opponent take on a character and try to kill each other first.

You can move, attack, charge, heal, or boost your speed on your turn, in addition to rotating yourself freely. Beware of the thorn bushes which hurt you or the rubble which will slow you down. 

I recommend playing the game in 1920 x 1080, other wise the UI might start crowding part of the screen.
